content:
From a few days ago:

GP Connect much like the Who..... i.e live at Leeds

https://digital.nhs.uk/news-and-events/latest-news/leeds-is-the-first-city-to-go-live-with-gp-connect

Thought it might amuse @Richard Kavanagh
Thanks @Adam Flinton Not sure I'd go with the "amuse" but I congratulate EMIS and Leeds for this deployment. I know there has been a lot of hard work involved by all parties.
Yes the payload is FHIR. It's a UK api to primary care data
